name: tsv2
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool odam.
Tool description: ODAM
API description: Fetches values from a specified data subset within a dataset using the ODAM RapidAPI.

limit.description: Limits the number of lines in the output table. Defaults to 10. A value of 0 means no limit.

debug.description: Debug status. When set to a non-zero value, debug mode is enabled. Defaults to 0.
